Package org.thinkit.framework.envali.helper

Class EnvaliContentHelper

java.lang.Object
org.thinkit.framework.envali.helper.EnvaliContentHelper
public final class EnvaliContentHelper
extends Object
A helper class that provides access to Envali's content.
Since:
1.0

    • of

      public static EnvaliContentHelper of​(@NonNull @NonNull ValidatableEntity entity, @NonNull @NonNull Field field)
      Returns the new instance of EnvaliContentHelper object.
      Parameters:
      entity - The validatable entity
      field - The field
      Returns:
      The new instance of EnvaliContentHelper object
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If null is passed as an argument

    • get

      public String get​(EnvaliContentAttribute attribute)
      Refer to the content file mapped to the entity object to be validated and get each expected value in Map format to be used at validation.
      Parameters:
      attribute - The EnvaliContentAttribute element to be retrieved from the content
      Returns:
      Envali's validation content
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If no ParameterMapping annotation is attached to the entity to be validated
      ContentNotFoundException - If the content file defined in ParameterMapping annotation was not found
      UnsupportedOperationException - If couldn't get Envali's content
